Articles.Content:
Hello,

I was quite sure that there were some functional docking ports somewhere hidden in the depth of the Spaceport, but I cannot find these parts. Am I wrong or can someone please point me into the right direction? I'd like to integrate these docking ports into my new rocket to make an Apollo-style mission to Mun.

Thank you very much.
Use Crew Manifest to move crew though attached ports and attached parts.

Thank you very much.

It currently says for 0.21.x, will there be an update of the mod? Unfortunately I could not find the forum topic for that particular mod.

Many (maybe even most) mods from 0.21 also work for 0.22 (although for use with Career mode you will have to add 2 lines to the part.cfg to tell KSP where on the science tree it is located and how much its prototype [something that AFAIK will be implemented later] will cost)
Crew Manifest does work without issues in 0.22, there's no part involved so no change needed, the button just appears in every ship that has a pod capable of having crew.

IS this still the best way to do this?

Hello,

I was quite sure that there were some functional docking ports somewhere hidden in the depth of the Spaceport, but I cannot find these parts. Am I wrong or can someone please point me into the right direction? I'd like to integrate these docking ports into my new rocket to make an Apollo-style mission to Mun.

Thank you very much.

Thank you very much.

It currently says for 0.21.x, will there be an update of the mod? Unfortunately I could not find the forum topic for that particular mod.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60936-0-23-0-Kerbal-Crew-Manifest-v0-5-6-2
